title: Turkey condemns decision to allow pro-Kurdish party rally in Germany
text:
May 26, 2018 / 2:26 PM / Updated 37 minutes ago Turkey condemns decision to allow pro-Kurdish party rally in Germany Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
ISTANBUL (Reuters) - The Turkish Foreign Ministry said on Saturday it condemned as a “double standard” a decision by Germany to allow a rally by the pro-Kurdish opposition HDP party in Cologne, having previously prevented ruling party politicians from campaigning there.
“This two-faced approach, which we condemn strongly, cannot be reconciled with democracy, the fight against terrorism and expectations of a normalisation in Turkish-Germany relations,” the ministry statement said. Reporting by Tulay Karadeniz; Writing by Daren Butler; Editing by Toby Chopra
